app.title: Medical AI Assistant
app.description: Application for recording consultations, transcription and generation of medical reports using AI
app.subtitle: Transform your medical consultations into structured reports using artificial intelligence and automatic transcription

audio.title: Audio Source
audio.description: Record new audio or upload a file from your computer
audio.note_description: You can {action} the audio and set the prompt simultaneously. Use the "Process" button when everything is ready.
audio.large_files_description: Files larger than 25MB will be automatically split into smaller segments for transcription. The process may take longer, but ensures 100% compatibility with the OpenAI API.

uploader.title: Audio Upload
uploader.description: Upload an audio file from your computer (any size)
uploader.drag_drop: Click here or drag an audio file
uploader.supported_formats: Supported formats: MP3, WAV, WebM, OGG, M4A, AAC
uploader.tip_description: For best results, use audio files with good quality and little background noise. Transcription works better with clear speech.
uploader.unsupported_format: Unsupported file format. Use MP3, WAV, WebM, OGG, M4A or AAC.

prompt.title: Instructions
prompt.description: Configure how the AI should analyze and process the audio content
prompt.tip_personality_desc: Define who the AI is (assistant, specialist, analyst, etc.)
prompt.tip_instructions_desc: Be specific about what you want to be done
prompt.tip_format_desc: Specify how you want the response (list, table, narrative, etc.)
prompt.tip_style_desc: Define the tone (formal, casual, technical, creative, etc.)
prompt.label: Complete Prompt (Personality + Instructions):
prompt.placeholder: Leave empty to use the default prompt or write your own instructions...
prompt.min_chars: The prompt must have at least 20 characters to be effective
prompt.default:
You are an intelligent assistant. Analyze the provided content and respond according to the specific instructions you receive.

Stay true to the original content and follow exactly the guidelines that are given.

processing.config_audio_prompt: Configure audio and prompt to continue
processing.record_upload_audio: Record or upload audio to continue
processing.please_provide: Please provide audio and configure the prompt before processing.
